title: Continued scalapack errors building PETSc
body:
@davydden 
See #4341; I'm still getting scalapack error installing petsc 3.4.4.  (I know 3.4.4 is ancient; but it's what I need to install at this point).

```
*******************************************************************************
         UNABLE to CONFIGURE with GIVEN OPTIONS    (see configure.log for details):
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
You must specify a path for scalapack with --with-scalapack-dir=<directory>
If you do not want scalapack, then give --with-scalapack=0
You might also consider using --download-scalapack instead
*******************************************************************************
```

Sounds like maybe we should re-do #4341 to use `--with-scalapack-dir` instead of `--with-scalapack-lib`???  Update: this worked for me, at least installing PETSc 3.4.4:

```
            options.extend([
#                '--with-scalapack-lib=%s' % scalapack.joined(),
                '--with-scalapack-dir=%s' % spec['scalapack'].prefix,
                '--with-scalapack=1'
```
